title: Madonna ordered this couple to get engaged onstage
text:
Madonna ordered this couple to get engaged onstage "Oh, Madonna stuck a microphone in my face onstage and demanded we get engaged." Post to Facebook Madonna ordered this couple to get engaged onstage "Oh, Madonna stuck a microphone in my face onstage and demanded we get engaged." Check out this story on wtsp.com: http://on.wtsp.com/1LuyT8Q Cancel Send A link has been sent to your friend's email address. Posted! A link has been posted to your Facebook feed. Join the Conversation To find out more about Facebook commenting please read the Conversation Guidelines and FAQs Madonna ordered this couple to get engaged onstage Maeve McDermott, USA TODAY 7:43 p.m. EDT October 14, 2015 Recording artist Madonna performs onstage with Drake during day 3 of the 2015 Coachella Valley Music & Arts Festival (Weekend 1) at the Empire Polo Club on April 12, 2015 in Indio, California. (Photo: Christopher Polk/Getty Images) 
How's this for a story at parties: 
"So, how'd he pop the question?" 
"Oh, Madonna stuck a microphone in my face onstage and demanded we get engaged." 
At a concert in Canada, Madonna chatted with Jan and Chad, a lovely couple in the front row. And when she requested that one of them propose into the microphone in front of thousands of strangers...well, you can't say no to Madonna, can you?
